mapper.select: SELECT s.sName, s.price, d.dAmount, TO_CHAR(d.dDate, 'MM') AS mdate, TO_CHAR(d.dDate, 'YYYY') AS ydate FROM Disposal d INNER JOIN SubClass s ON d.scSerialNumber = s.scSerialNumber WHERE TO_CHAR(d.dDate, 'YYYY') = #{ydate}
SELECT s.sName, sum(d.dAmount*s.price) As dAmount FROM Disposal d INNER JOIN SubClass s ON d.scSerialNumber = s.scSerialNumber GROUP BY s.sName
